sentences.english: Local authorities are now looking into perjury charges against pro-ID board members who apparently lied in depositions and on the witness stand.
sentences.chinese: 显然这些理事会成员在宣示作证时和证人席上撒了谎。

sentences.english: The wind of change that fans the flame.
sentences.chinese: 这宣示改变的风，让心中火焰永远不熄。

sentences.english: The bombing of Baghdad demonstrated the awesome power and might of the US military.
sentences.chinese: 对巴格达的轰炸向全世界宣示了美国强大的军事力量。

sentences.english: It was a  creed written into the founding documents that declared the  destiny of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 它是写进开国宪章的信条，宣示了这个国家的命运。

sentences.english: The sound of three bangs on a gong signalled the impending arrival of Kim’s son and grandson.
sentences.chinese: 三声锣声宣示金日成的儿子和孙子的即将到来。

sentences.english: Anguine grain also jumps sneaker face unexpectedly, also be in it seems that declare Xiaolong year advent.
sentences.chinese: 蛇纹竟也跃上运动鞋面，似乎也在宣示小龙年的来临。

sentences.english: Ministry of Education shows its determination to keep bully away from campus through the campaign of declaration.
sentences.chinese: 教育部透过宣示活动展现反霸凌决心。

sentences.english: “I am the head gardener, ” he announced.
Having the vulnerability been announced HTC commenced to release hotfixes.
sentences.chinese: 在此漏洞被宣示之后，HTC开始着手发布修补程序。

sentences.english: The United States doesn't support any country's claim over the islands.
sentences.chinese: 美国不会支持任何国家对南海诸岛宣示主权。

sentences.english: Even crossing the street became an act to tell me about his pride for his country.
sentences.chinese: 就连过马路也成为他向我宣示国家自豪感的行为。

definition: to swear an oath (of office)/to make a vow
to proclaim/to make public or well known
to demonstrate (as a protest)/a demonstration/a military show of force
to be ready to go to war

pinyin: shen2 sheng4 bu4 ke3 qin1 fan4

definition: to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
